issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{code:sql}
hive> CREATE TABLE src (key STRING COMMENT 'default', value STRING COMMENT 'default') STORED AS TEXTFILE;

hive> explain select * from src where key > '4';
Failed with exception wrong number of arguments
FAILED: Execution Error, return code 1 from org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.ExplainTask
{code}
